code: import{ADD_FLASH_MESSAGE}from'../types/index';export var errorFlashMessage=function errorFlashMessage(error,dispatch){var type=arguments.length>2&&arguments[2]!==undefined?arguments[2]:"success";var message={message:error.response.data.message,type:type};dispatch({type:ADD_FLASH_MESSAGE,payload:message});};export var addFlashMessage=function addFlashMessage(message,dispatch){var type=arguments.length>2&&arguments[2]!==undefined?arguments[2]:'success';var messageData={message:message,type:type};dispatch({type:ADD_FLASH_MESSAGE,payload:messageData});};
